name: Uncertain Times
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

During uncertain times, everything is strange and unclear: Who are you? What are you doing? Why do you exist? Where are you going? When will it all end?

Uncertain times is a multiplayer game, where Player 1 and Player 2 must work together to climb out of this hell hole.

  • Player 1  uses WD to move and SPACEBAR to jump
  • Player 2 uses ← → to move and Right ↑ to jump
